data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 25,023 believers in Khánh Hòa, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khánh Hòa, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Khánh Hòa, Vietnam to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Khánh Hòa, Vietnam to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Khánh Hòa, Vietnam.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Cham, Eastern people might believe through him.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 25,023 believers in Khánh Hòa, Vietnam a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Khánh Hòa, Vietnam.

data.section_summary:
the state of Khánh Hòa, Vietnam has a population of 1,156,900.

We estimate Khánh Hòa has 25,023 people who might know Jesus, 92,798 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,039,079 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Khánh Hòa to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

location.name: Khánh Hòa
location.cities_list: Nha Trang, Ninh Hòa, Cam Ranh, Khánh Vĩnh, Tô Hạp
